item.description:
WZLX and Blockbuster are having a party to celebrate the release of Star Trek on DVD, and you're invited! The party starts at 9:30 and goes until midnight, with music, Star Trek trivia, and prizes, including movie posters, pins, Star Trek on DVD, and even 52 free rentals from Blockbuster!

Trekkies (or trekkers, if you prefer) and their friends are welcome, this is a free event. Be among the first to own and watch Star Trek on DVD!

This party is happening at the Blockbuster on 481 Harvard St in Brookline. If you're taking the T, you can ride the Green Line (B Boston College) and get off at Harvard Ave, then walk two blocks down Harvard St. If you're arriving via shuttlecraft, please park it in low-earth orbit and beam down directly, shuttlecraft parking in Brookline is minimal at best.
item.name: Star Trek Release Party
